original: Ödman, Martin Alfred Elias, komminister, Borås, f. 17/2/84 i Berga, Ska-rab. 1., av folkskoll. Alfred Ö. o. Kristina Carlsson. G. 26 m. Sigrid Nordlund. Barn: Ragnar f. 27, Gunnar 32, Birgitta 37. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 10, teol. fil. ex. 12, teol. kand. samt prakt, teol. prov 1’5, prästv. f. Skara stift 16. Kyrkoadj. i Alingsås 18, las :pred. 18-22, kommin. i Borås sed. 22, las :pred. där 23-44. Ordf. i Brämhults barnav:-nd sed. 39, suppl. i Borås barnav:nd sed. 42.
translated: Ödman, Martin Alfred Elias, curate, Borås, b. 17/2/84 in Berga, Ska-rab. 1., son of elementary school teacher Alfred Ö. and Kristina Carlsson. Married 26/xx/ Sigrid Nordlund. Children: Ragnar b. 27, Gunnar b. 32, Birgitta b. 37. — Graduated from Uppsala University in 1910, Bachelor of Theology in 1912, Master of Theology and practical theology exam in 1915, ordained as a priest for the Skara diocese in 1916. Church assistant in Alingsås 1918, lay preacher from 1918-1922, curate in Borås since 1922, lay preacher there from 1923-1944. Chairman of Brämhult children's welfare committee since 1939, substitute in Borås children's welfare committee since 1942.
